dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A classic control problem where a pole is balanced on a cart that moves along a track. The goal is to keep the pole upright by applying forces to the cart.
dcterms:title: CartPole-v0

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A classic control problem where a two-link robotic arm must swing up and balance in an upright position. The goal is to keep the end of the arm upright by applying forces to the joints.
dcterms:title: Acrobot-v1
